titleStmt.title: A generall bill for 8 vveeks shewing all the burials and christninges within the city of London and the liberties thereof, and all the burials in other parishes in the skirts of the city and out of the freedome and other places neare vnto the citty : that is to say, from the 14 of Iuly 1603 to the 8 of September 1603, as here vnder by the partculars [sic] appeareth.
titleStmt.author: Worshipful Company of Parish Clerks.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Windet, printer to the honourable citie of London,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University. Library.
